subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nationals Manager Davey Johnson said he decided to bench the star right-hander Stephen Strasburg, who had a 15-6 record, because of the distraction caused by his innings limit.
snippet: Nationals Manager Davey Johnson said he decided to bench the star right-hander Stephen Strasburg, who had a 15-6 record, because of the distraction caused by his innings limit.
